name: Night Rider (fishynator)
description:
Night Rider

Navigate through a haunted estate with your trusty bicycle. Use the physics-based movement to your advantage to overcome obstacles. Some hurdles will even require that you find a way to flip the world upside down. 

But the environment isn't your only problem. Haunted by ghosts, the only thing that will keep you safe in this mansion, is a targeted flash of your headlight. 

Created for GBJAM 9.

Controls KeyboardGame BoyFunctionW / Up arrow keyD-pad upMove forwardS / Down arrow keyD-pad downMove backward / BreakA D / Left right arrow keysD-pad left rightLean left rightKAFlash headlight to damage ghostsJBFlip gravityEnterStartReturn to last checkpoint

Used color palette: Slurry GB
